mentalyc.title: Mentalyc App
mentalyc.description: Implemented a demo for the Clients page and its Design System in Storybook using the provided Figma prototype, where I provided suggestions to make the UI more user-friendly and compliant with accessibility standards.

polkamarkets.title: Polkamarkets App
polkamarkets.description: Updated the Polkamarkets App to version 2 presenting a splash screen and social login flow in a brand new homepage and market page by an optimized team development experience after implementing Jest Testing Framework and CSS Modules.

ufal.title: U.F.A.L. 60 Years
ufal.description: Led the Virtual Exhibition UI/UX design and frontend development with React and Material UI that shows the University evolution throughout its 60 years of history.

vitalk.title: Ways to create Design Tokens
vitalk.description: Analyzed the Vitalk Portal and simulated a website refresh by mapping its design tokens in Figma to improve its components accessibility between device mode, later writing a Medium article about how important a Design System is to a product.

bepro.title: Bepro App
bepro.description: Contributed for the brand new Bepro App frontend maintaining the design systems and flows with read-only Figma components and design tokens using Bootstrap framework built with React.

reduced_resources.description: Your device is probably on power saving mode. Would you like to disable it and reload the page for a better web experience?

web_analytics.title: ðŸ“Š Web Analytics
web_analytics.description: This website uses a privacy-friendly third-party web analytics services to track visitors by country, device and browser; so it can be enhanced overtime.
